price: 29. Uma ay ooyin samada iyo arladu, lamana siin wax fursad (kansho) ah.
arabic: فَمَا بَكَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُنظَرِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: famā bakat ʿalayhimu al-samāu wal-arḍu wamā kānū munẓarīna
